sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_G107M (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, RESID, CARD_AMT_SUM_3, CARD_AMT_SUM_4_7, CARD_AMT_SUM_OTH, CARD_TDMR_SUM_3, CARD_TDMR_SUM_4_7, CARD_TDMR_SUM_OTH, CARD_PBT_SUM_3, CARD_PBT_SUM_4_7, CARD_PBT_SUM_OTH, CARD_BOOK_SUM_3, CARD_BOOK_SUM_4_7, CARD_BOOK_SUM_OTH, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR ) VALUES (#dpobCd#, #yrtxBlggYr#, #clutSeptCd#, #systemkey#, #resid#, #cardAmtSum3#, #cardAmtSum47#, #cardAmtSumOth#, #cardTdmrSum3#, #cardTdmrSum47#, #cardTdmrSumOth#, #cardPbtSum3#, #cardPbtSum47#, #cardPbtSumOth#, #cardBookSum3#, #cardBookSum47#, #cardBookSumOth#, #kybdr#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_G107M SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cardSeilNum# , CARD_AMT_MN=#cardAmtMn# , CARD_MM_AMT=#cardMmAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cardSeilNum# AND CARD_AMT_MN=#cardAmtMn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_G107M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CARD_SEIL_NUM , CARD_AMT_MN , CARD_MM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G107M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cardSeilNum# AND CARD_AMT_MN=#cardAmtMn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CARD_SEIL_NUM , CARD_AMT_MN , CARD_MM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G107M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CARD_SEIL_NUM DESC , CARD_AMT_MN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_G107M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
